org.jclouds.slicehost
Interface SlicehostAsyncClient

public interface SlicehostAsyncClient

Provides asynchronous access to Slicehost via their REST API.

All commands return a ListenableFuture of the result from Slicehost. Any exceptions incurred during processing will be wrapped in an ExecutionException as documented in Future.get().

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
SlicehostClient,
